tasks.text:
# Scene Handling
## Rendering Flags
* objects set or don't set different rendering flags like shadows instead of having an object list where every objects renders it

## Serialization
* Actually use serialization and deserialization of scenes instead of hardcoding them

## Implement
Screenspace to NDC function

NDC to screenspace function
## Test
Make the screensize something weird to make sure we don't have overly aggresive rounding errors.

Check every corner explicitly.

Write a test that checks the inverse invariance with maximal allowed offset of 1, i.e.
```
|f(f^-1(x)) - x| <= 1
```
